channel.title: brewscheme
channel.description: Making it easier for you to generate the data visualizations you want from Stata less verbose, easier to reproduce, and more flexible for inclusion in production environments.

item.title: A new homepage for BREWSCHEME
item.description:
I decided to learn a bit more about creating GitHub Pages using Jekyll to make the site a bit more useful. Youâ€™ll still
find the same content that was previously located in the README, but it should be easier to navigate back and forth between
the subroutines in the package now.
